StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateProspectDependentFromMcriss]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MarineCandidateID int, @OldRecDependentType varchar(2), @OldRecFirstName varchar(30), @OldRecLastName varchar(20), @OldRecMiddleName varchar(20), @OldRecSu.x varchar(5), @OldRecDateOfBirth date.me, @DependentType varchar(2), @IsVeri.ed char(1), @FirstName varchar(30), @LastName varchar(20), @MiddleName varchar(20), @Su.x varchar(5), @DateOfBirth date.me, @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS BEGIN
-- STEP 1: Start the transac.on BEGIN TRANSACTION
DECLARE @ProspectID uniqueiden..er
SELECT Top 1 @ProspectID = ProspectId FROM USMC.Prospect WHERE NwaId IN (SELECT rowguid FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateID)
IF @ProspectID IS NOT NULL BEGIN
DECLARE @ID uniqueiden..er
SELECT @ID = ProspectDependentId FROM USMC.ProspectDependent WHERE ProspectId = @ProspectID AND (FirstName = @OldRecFirstName) AND (LastName = @OldRecLastName) AND (MiddleName = @OldRecMiddleName OR @OldRecMiddleName IS NULL ) AND (Su.xCode = @OldRecSu.x OR @OldRecSu.x IS NULL) AND (DependentType = @OldRecDependentType) AND (DateOfBirth = @OldRecDateOfBirth)
-- STEP 2 & 3: Issue the data change statement(s), checking @@ERROR a.er each statement IF @ID IS NOT NULL BEGIN -- if already exists. UPDATE. UPDATE [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectDependent] SET [FirstName] = @FirstName ,[LastName] = @LastName ,[MiddleName] = @MiddleName ,[Su.xCode] = @Su.x ,[DependentType] = @DependentType ,[DateOfBirth] = @DateOfBirth ,[LastUpdateDate] = GETDATE() ,[LastUpdateUserId] = @UserLogin ,[RecordStatus] = @IsVeri.ed
WHERE ProspectDependentId = @ID END ELSE BEGIN -- if does not exist. INSERT. INSERT INTO [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectDependent] ([ProspectDependentId] ,[ProspectId] ,[FirstName] ,[LastName] ,[MiddleName] ,[Su.xCode] ,[DependentType] ,[DateOfBirth] ,[LastUpdateDate] ,[LastUpdateUserId] ,[RecordStatus] ,[OtherDescrip.on] ,[DependentAddressID]) VALUES (NEWID() ,@ProspectID ,@FirstName ,@LastName ,@MiddleName ,@Su.x ,@DependentType ,@DateOfBirth ,GETDATE() ,@UserLogin ,@IsVeri.ed ,NULL ,NULL) END END -- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- STEP 4: If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully -- Commit the transac.on.... COMMIT TRANSACTION
END
